Isn't it funny that for years schools cried for more parent involvement. They claimed they couldn't be successful without parents. Now they scream to let the experts decide curriculum. Remember when teacher unions and teachers across the country started being political campaigners for one party and activist against police. Yeah they have no footing on even calling themselves experts when they don't even teach any actual subjects of learnings.
You vote for Democrats knowing you are too stupid to understand and must be forced to do what is right.
Yes this is just a small example of what is gonna happen in the years to come.

We should remove party affiliations from ballots and force be to educate themselves on who they vote for. Biden is in office specifically because people voted on emotion and not policy priorities.
